data.prayer: Father, it’s possible most of the 1,246,627 lost people in  Ardebil, Iran have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Ardebil, Iran
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Ardebil, Iran.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.section_summary: On average, 70 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Ardebil, Iran.
data.prayer: Father, send your gospel to these.
Father, you desire the people in the state of Ardebil who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Ardebil, Iran a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Karingani people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Karingani people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Karingani people is yours.
Father, please raise up prophets in Ardebil who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 6,618 believers in Ardebil, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.prayer: Father, please make every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the state of Ardebil.
